reviews.name: Samuel Reed
reviews.comment: The area was perfect for families. It had enough space for kids to play and adults to relax. The maintenance staff did a great job keeping it clean and welcoming.

reviews.name: R4F4
reviews.comment:
What to say about the Civic Center?

What an amazing park and leisure area that offers green grass areas to lay down and relax and many tables and chairs to take a break during work. Make sure you take the time and read what the park was built for.

I highly recommend it!

reviews.name: Fil Lorinc
reviews.comment: The natural elements and the water feature are nice but the grounds are frequented by displaced individuals so this can create somewhat of a clash for folks that aren't used to it.

reviews.name: TJ Smith
reviews.comment: I thought it was going to be super nice however it is was full of unhoused people hanging out. I'm glad they have a spot to go

reviews.name: Kenia L
reviews.comment: It's comfortable and visually pleasing, however, I thought it would be much bigger, but in reality it's too small, but if you just want to sit for a while, I guess you'll enjoy it.

reviews.name: Tracy Torbett
reviews.comment: We visited 4/20/19 in the early evening.  It was a refreshing place to enjoy some greenery and watch the city of Dallas. A street performer was playing guitar nearby which added to the allure.  Within walking distance to many hotels downtown, donâ€™t miss this beautiful spot!

reviews.name: Natalie Jaroszewski
reviews.comment:
Very small, but cute. I liked it enough to take some of my civic wedding photos there. :)
Of course it is right in the middle of major streets, so not a good pet area.
There a few picnic tables, and the butterfly statues are cool for kids.

reviews.name: Abhilasha A Rathi
reviews.comment: Such a fun place to go anytime. Kids enjoy water splash.PlaygroundIt's good space for kids to run around.RestroomsNo restroomsDog-friendlinessYesPicnic areaIt's a very comfortable place for picnic only on good weather days.

reviews.name: Lawrence Mendoza
reviews.comment: A great place to take a stroll or just sit. It is also a dog friendly park. It is overall a very good place to go to enjoy the scenery.

reviews.name: Melissa Anderson
reviews.comment: Not a bad view  anyway you look. Love this park. Just one more reason I  am  blessed  to call Dallas home! +5
